settings.popupcontent:
Jaminan 100% Authentic atau Uang Kembali
Kami menjamin seluruh produk Voila.id 100% Authentic atau Original.
Kami akan mengembalikan 100% uang Anda jika produk kami terbukti tidak asli*.

Pengiriman
Waktu pengiriman ditentukan oleh setiap jasa pengiriman yang dipilih serta jarak lokasi Anda.

Proses pesanan:
  • Pemesanan sebelum pukul 16:00 WIB, akan dikirimkan pada hari yang sama
  • Pemesanan setelah pukul 16:00 WIB, akan dikirimkan keesokan harinya.

Pengiriman setiap hari Senin - Minggu (Khusus hari minggu JNE tutup)
Informasi selengkapnya klik disini

Pengembalian Barang (Retur)
Voila.id memberikan layanan jangka waktu 3 hari bagi Anda yang ingin melakukan pengajuan pengembalian produk karena kondisi produk berbeda atau karena adanya cacat produk yang bukan karena penggunaan.

Informasi selengkapnya klik disini
settings.popupcontentshipping:
GRATIS ONGKIR

Nikmati promo GRATIS ONGKIR ke seluruh kota di Indonesia tanpa syarat. Jangan lewatkan kesempatan promosi yang berlangsung eksklusif ini dan temukan ribuan koleksi pilihan yang dijamin 100% autentik.

Jaminan keamanan dan ketelitian pengiriman menjadi prioritas utama kami hingga tibanya barang ke tangan kamu.

settings.question: What services are include in all-in-one treatment?
settings.answer: All in one treatments include cleaning, retouch, recoloring (if needed), and coating.

settings.question: If the item was not purchased at voilà.id, can it be repaired at Kaya Leathers?
settings.answer: Absolutely! Yet, we have an exclusive deal specifically for purchases made at voilà.id. Whether you're looking to repair or pamper your collection at Kaya Leathers, you are eligible for this special offer.

settings.question: Can you recolor patent leathers items?
settings.answer: Certainly, we can. However, there are certain factors to consider when recoloring and changing the color of patent leather. For more information, please consult/WhatsApp our outlet team.

settings.question: Will the leather texture change after recolor?
settings.answer: The texture may change slightly from its original state in the area we worked on. The extent of texture change depends on the severity of the item's condition and the amount of material applied. However, we always strive to restore the leather to its original texture as much as possible.

settings.question: How long is the warranty provided by Kaya Leathers after the item is collected?
settings.answer: The warranty period lasts for 7 working days from the day your item is collected/delivered. If there is any damage or product mismatch during the warranty period, customers can return the product at no additional cost.

settings.question: How long does the process take at Kaya Leathers?
settings.answer: The normal processing time is 14-21 working days. For patent leather and certain specific cases, it may take 1-3 months. Additional time may be required to ensure the item is fully ready. However, it is possible that the item can be completed faster.

settings.question: Why does the process take long?
settings.answer:
1. Queue: there are still many people who need restoration services for their branded items. It seems like more and more people are becoming aware of sustainable fashion!
  2. Manpower: our workshop team consists of a total of 10 individuals. We provide specialized training that requires an annual commitment.
  3. Quality Control: our QC team follows strict standards and focuses on maintaining high-quality output.

settings.question: Do you offer a fast/express service?
settings.answer: Absolutely! Our fast/express service utilizes our priority service option. The maximum processing time for this service is 7 working days, with an additional cost of 50%. Please be aware that certain cases may not be eligible for the priority service.
